hotels.title: Stylish Maseru Retreat in Lesotho's Capital
hotels.description: Escape from the city, in the city, at Avani Maseru Hotel, set against a rugged mountainscape in Lesotho's vibrant capital. Head off on an afternoon of horse riding and hiking through the rolling landscape, organised by the resort, or choose one of the many tours showcasing the villages scatted within the mountains. Return to lounge in the sunshine by the spectacular pool and feast on local flavours at Mohokare Restaurant.
